title: e621

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Each night, make someone horny. They won't know it, but their direct neighbors will.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Horny players will occasionally miss their action due to... ...interpersonal actions....
- Members of the Were faction has a higher chance of missing.
- You can only attack players that are horny.
- Your ability will fail on Asmodeus (Post 359)
- Miss chances:
- regular:20%
- Weres:40%
- Furry (2285): 60%

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: and this is where Jd ends the rolecard. BE THE LAST MAN STANDING.

desc:

*geT THE FUCK OFF OF E621, BIONIC!*
